properties.areaDesc: Wabash, IL; White, IL; Posey, IN; Gallatin, IL; Gibson, IN
properties.headline: Flood Warning issued January 11 at 10:37AM CST by NWS Paducah KY
properties.description:
...The flood warning continues for the following river in
Illinois...Indiana...

Wabash River at New Harmony

.Heavy rainfall over the past 36 hours has caused water levels to rise
along the Wabash River at New Harmony. Moderate flooding is forecast.
Flood stage will be reached tonight while moderate stage is forecast
to be reached Thursday afternoon with a crest of 20.9 feet Monday January
20th.

The Flood Warning continues for
the Wabash River at New Harmony.
* from late tonight until further notice.
* At  9:30 AM Saturday the stage was 13.2 feet.
* Flood Stage is 15.0 feet.
* Moderate flooding is forecast.
* Forecast...Rise above flood stage tonight and
continue to rise to near 20.9 feet by Monday January 20th.
* Impact...At 21.0 Feet...The river is 3 miles wide at I-64.
properties.instruction:
SAFETY MESSAGE...

Never drive cars...trucks or sport utility vehicles through flooded
areas. The water may be too deep to allow safe passage. Never allow
children to play in or near flood waters. Stay tuned to NOAA Weather
Radio or your local media for further statements and possible updated
forecasts.

Additional information is available at
http://www.crh.noaa.gov/ahps2/index.php?wfo=pah /lower case/
